testsuite.name: com.grailsinaction.UserIntegrationIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: Saving our first user to the database
Updating a saved user changes its properties
Deleting an existing user removes it from the database
Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error
Recovering from a failed save by fixing invalid properties
Ensure posts linked to a user can be retrieved
Ensure a user can follow other users

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Saving our first user to the database-- --Output from Updating a saved user changes its properties-- --Output from Deleting an existing user removes it from the database-- --Output from Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error-- --Output from Recovering from a failed save by fixing invalid properties-- --Output from Ensure posts linked to a user can be retrieved-- --Output from Ensure a user can follow other users--
